WTOBJECT.name: Lead
WTOBJECT.WTCUSTOM: For x = 1 To 10 first = trim(Request.Form.Item("First" & x)) last = trim(Request.Form.Item("Last" & x)) If first <> "" OR last <> "" Then .NameFirst = trim(first) .NameLast = trim(last) .Phone1 = trim(Request.Form.Item("Phone" & x)) .Email = trim(Request.Form.Item("Email" & x)) .Priority = trim(Request.Form.Item("Priority" & x)) .Comment = trim(Request.Form.Item("Note" & x)) LeadID = CLng(.Add(CLng(reqSysUserID))) End If Next

WTCODEGROUP.WTCUSTOM: DoError reqUploadError, "Import", reqLeads & " Leads Successfully Imported!"

WTOBJECT.name: Leads
WTOBJECT.WTCUSTOM: reqCount = 0 For Each oLead in oLeads reqCount = reqCount + 1 Next reqCount = FormatNumber(reqCount,0)

WTOBJECT.name: Leads
WTOBJECT.WTCUSTOM:
tmpCount = 0 tmpBody = "You can access these new contacts with your Contact Manager." + "
" For Each oLead in oLeads With oLead If Request.Form.Item(.LeadID) = "on" Then .Load .LeadID, 1 .MemberID = reqNewMemberID .DistributorID = reqMemberID .DistributeDate = Now() .Save 1 tmpCount = tmpCount + 1 tmpBody = tmpBody + .NameFirst + " " + .NameLast + " (#" + .LeadID + ") " + .Phone1 + " " + .Email + " " + .City + " " + .State + " " + .Zip + " " + .Country + "
" End If End With Next DoError reqUploadError, "Distribute", tmpCount & " Contacts Distributed!" tmpBody = tmpBody + "" & tmpCount & " Total Contacts" tmpSubject = "CONTACTS: " & tmpCount & " from " + tmpSubject Set oMail = server.CreateObject("CDO.Message") If oMail Is Nothing Then DoError Err.Number, Err.Source, "Unable to Create Object - CDO.Message" Else With oMail .Sender = tmpSender .From = tmpFrom .To = tmpTo .CC = tmpFrom .Subject = tmpSubject .HTMLBody = tmpBody .Send End With End If Set oMail = Nothing If tmpMsgTo <> "" Then SendMsg 1, tmpMsgTo, tmpSubject, tmpBody End If
